## Government Tender Announcement

### Title
Glebe House Foundation Rehabilitation – Cape Breton Highlands National Park

### Reference Number
PW-22-01009311

### Solicitation Number
5P468-22-0150/A

### Tender Closing Date
26 October 2022, 13:00:00 [Local Time]

### Contract Description
Parks Canada is seeking contractors to rehabilitate the Glebe House in Cape Breton Highlands National Park. The contract includes the provision of all necessary materials, labour, equipment, and ancillaries for the completion of the work as indicated on the drawings and described in the specifications and notes.

### Contract Requirements

- Disconnect utilities and lift the existing Glebe House
- Remove the existing foundation
- Construct a new foundation system complete with drainage and insulation
- Place the Glebe House back on the new foundation
- Supply and install a new sump pump system
- Supply and install electrical requirements
- Provide backfill, regrade the lot, and provide landscaping requirements to ensure proper surface drainage/runoff
- Reconnect all utilities

### Tender Submissions
Tender submissions will be accepted by fax and email. Only fax number 1-855-983-1808 and email address soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca will be accepted for responses to bid solicitations. Bids submitted by courier will not be accepted.

### Bid Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation criteria for bids will be based on the lowest bid compliant with the contract requirements.

### Site Visit
A site visit is recommended to allow bidders to inspect the project site and ask questions. Bidders are requested to confirm their participation and attendance no later than 24 hours before the site visit by contacting the contracting authority.

### Contract Duration
The contractor is required to complete the work no later than April 28, 2023.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
- Sheldon Lalonde, Contracting Authority
- Phone: 13435853836
- Email: Sheldon.Lalonde@pc.gc.ca
- Fax: 1-855-983-1808

### For More Information
Please visit the Government of Canada's procurement website at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities to obtain further information and access to bid documents. Late submissions will not be considered, and bidders are responsible for ensuring that their submissions comply with all contract requirements.
